name: tineco
0:
”Alexa, ask smart vacuum to report the remaining battery.”
”Alexa, ask smart vacuum to tell me this week's cleaning report.”
”Alexa, ask smart vacuum to tell me today's cleaning report.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart vacuum
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Alexa voice service, you can obtain the information of power and filter life from the device.
You can obtain your device information through Alexa speaker. To get started, make sure you have an Tineco account registered in the Tineco APP and your device is connected and online.
When the connection is successfully built, you can simply control device by saying:
-“Alexa, ask smart vacuum to report the remaining battery.”
-“Alexa, ask smart vacuum to report the remaining life of pre filter.”
-“Alexa, ask smart vacuum to tell me today's cleaning report.”
-“Alexa, ask smart vacuum to tell me this week's cleaning report.”
-“Alexa, ask smart vacuum to remind me of cleaning my house at xo'clock on xxx.”
